scripts.prepublish: babel ./src --out-dir ./lib --source-maps --presets es2015,react,stage-0 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports && browserify ./lib/react-avatar-image-cropper.js ./lib/sliderBtn.js -o ./build/react-cropper.js --transform browserify-global-shim --standalone ReactCropper &&   uglifyjs ./build/react-cropper.js --compress --mangle --output ./build/react-cropper.min.js --source-map ./build/react-cropper.min.js.map
